title: Arrange a Vessel Crew Change
description: A vessel agent needs to arrange for five crew members to sign off the ship and five to sign on.

tasks.description: Receive the crew change request with the names and details of the signing on/off crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator has the full list of crew members.

tasks.description: Coordinate with immigration and customs authorities to get the necessary clearances and shore passes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator submits the crew list to the authorities for approval.

tasks.description: Arrange for transportation to take the signing-off crew from the vessel to the airport and the signing-on crew to the vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Transport is booked with an approved provider.
